Instance.name: GetFileTimestamps[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Retrieves the timestamps (creation, last write, and last access) of the specified file or directory.
Instance.param: The path of the directory or file to check for existence.
Instance.returns: A object containing the timestamps of the specified directory.

Instance.name: Exists[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Checks if the specified directory or file exists at the given entry path.
Instance.param: The path of the directory or file to check for existence.
Instance.returns: True if the directory or file exists; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: EnumerateDirectories[EntryPath,EnumerationOptions]
Instance.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of directory names in the specified directory and matching the specified search pattern and options.
Instance.param: The path to the directory to enumerate.
An object that specifies options to control the search behavior, such as search pattern and recursion depth.
Instance.returns: An enumerable collection of directory names that match the specified criteria.

Instance.name: EnumerateFiles[EntryPath,EnumerationOptions]
Instance.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of file names in the specified directory and matching the specified search pattern and options.
Instance.param: The path to the directory to enumerate.
An object that specifies options to control the search behavior, such as search pattern and recursion depth.
Instance.returns: An enumerable collection of file names that match the specified criteria.
